history.proof: intros c a b H1 H2 H3. apply Rle_lt_trans with (r2 := a). qsimpl time: 2. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmult_comm. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmult_lt_compat_r,Rmult_comm. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmult_lt_compat_r,Rmult_comm. hauto use: Rmult_1_l, Rle_lt_trans, Rmult_comm.

ctx: intros c a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment c, a, b : R H1 : 0 < b H2 : c < 1 H3 : a <= b * c Unable to unify "a <= b * c" with "a <= a".

ctx: intros c a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: The LHS of Rmult_comm (_ * _) does not match any subterm of the goal

ctx: intros c a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 * r2 = r2 * r1 c, a, b : R H1 : 0 < b H2 : c < 1 H3 : a <= b * c Unable to unify "?M2361 * ?M2360 < ?M2362 * ?M2360" with "a < b".

ctx: intros c a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment H4 : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 * r2 = r2 * r1 H0 : forall r r1 r2 : R, 0 < r -> r1 < r2 -> r1 * r < r2 * r c, a, b : R H1 : 0 < b H2 : c < 1 H3 : a <= b * c Unable to unify "0 < b" with "a < b".

ctx: intros c a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment H5 : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 * r2 = r2 * r1 H : forall r r1 r2 : R, 0 < r -> r1 < r2 -> r1 * r < r2 * r c, a, b : R H1 : 0 < b H2 : c < 1 H3 : a <= b * c Unable to unify "c < 1" with "a < 1".

ctx: intros c a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment H4 : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 * r2 = r2 * r1 H0 : forall r r1 r2 : R, 0 < r -> r1 < r2 -> r1 * r < r2 * r c, a, b : R H1 : 0 < b H2 : c < 1 H3 : a <= b * c Unable to unify "c < 1" with "a < c".

ctx: intros c a b H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment H5 : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 * r2 = r2 * r1 H : forall r r1 r2 : R, 0 < r -> r1 < r2 -> r1 * r < r2 * r c, a, b : R H1 : 0 < b H2 : c < 1 H3 : a <= b * c Unable to unify "c < 1" with "a < c".

original: intros c a b H1 H2 H3. apply Rle_lt_trans with (r2 := a). apply H3. rewrite Rmult_comm. apply Rmult_lt_compat_r. apply H1. apply Rlt_trans with (r2 := 1). apply H2. apply Rlt_trans with (r2 := c). apply H2. apply H2.
